text: I don’t wanna feel my heart hurt anymore. All the good that I did always go down the drain and goes unappreciated. I am tired of trying my best. Someone, please make my heart stop beating. I’m just tired of everything. It would’ve been better for everything to disappear, including me.

title: I need a “reason” to have low moods, and if I don’t, it’s time for unsolicited advice.
text:
I’ve been suffering with chronic depression and anxiety ever since I was a child, like many of you here, and have been struggling hard to survive for the last 15 years. I’m resigned to the fact it’s always going to be around, but I’ve taken steps to ‘manage’ my condition by exercising, trying to sleep good, trying to improve my eating habits (sometimes unsuccessfully), etc. I sometimes have good times where I’m content and moments where I’d say I’m even ‘happy’ when I achieve something.

But depression has affected every aspect of my life, I was academically bright, did really well in my studies despite my struggles up until I got to college where I couldn’t handle it anymore. I begged my parents to let me take a year after I basically just scraped a pass in one of my A-Levels (which was a first for me as I was always a straight A student), but they keep me running on the hamster wheel to basically ‘ship me off’ to a husband (that’s what I was always told growing up) as if I’m checking boxes so they can say they’ve done their duty. I pushed myself through university, but couldn’t do any more after reaching my second year of undergrad. I, despite everything, braved taking a break and deferring my studies. 

They made my life hell during the one year I was at home, even though I was job hunting and even got my driving license (with my own money) but they treated me like I was the biggest failure ever and I was now a burden forever according to them. I’m not allowed to forget that I ‘dropped out’, I now have a law degree and currently doing my masters degree, but it’s still the ‘don’t you dare skip uni’, ‘don’t you dare drop out’ — I want to say fuck you, I asked you for help at my lowest moment and you basically told me you’d help me kill myself and that I had no right to be depressed and that I was ‘too sensitive’. My mother is a narcissist and she has to make everything about her, so I’ve never been allowed to talk about my feelings openly. She’s never once helped me with my homework as a kid, she told me on numerous occasions that she wished I was never born even though I’m the one child out of my siblings who does the most to please her. She makes a big deal out of any time I tell her ‘no’ and try to draw boundaries.

Basically, years of emotional abuse, controlling behaviour and even financial abuse and I’m desperately trying to recover from it all. It feels impossible to detach my self-worth from my ‘achievements’ in life.

And my lowest lows still come back, sometimes without any obvious trigger. Sometimes I’m fine and then I randomly crash, but I try to function or distract myself from it until I’m ‘okay’ again. I don’t let myself stay in bed anymore, but I can’t walk around and laugh or smile. I need to feel my emotions and process them so that I can bounce back. But my sister who- despite suffering similar things in the same household- won’t let me. She thinks she’s helping when she tells me to ‘get over it’, ‘just go and exercise’, etc. She has a degree in fucking psychology but she’s got no empathy. Even when we’re talking about topics like homelessness and victims of domestic violence (which is sort of my field since I worked with them for about a year), she thinks that it’s their own fault they can’t ’get out’. Hello? Tone deaf much? We’re both still stuck at home with our narcissistic mother because it’s very difficult to move out with the current economy.

I don’t even ask for her advice, I’ve told her multiple times that it’s dismissive of my feelings and that it really upsets me when she criticises me for being low. She refuses to apologise which I don’t even fucking care about, but I wish she’d just leave me alone and mind her own business. I don’t even tell her I’m sad or complain, she sees me sitting alone or gaming and starts with ‘your problem is…’. Then feels justified and has this sort of haughty expression on her face when I get pissed off or roll my eyes at her.

Let me feel, please. It’s not your business.

title: My depression & partner’s grief. I really need help.
text:
I am struggling, big time. 

For the past 4 months, I have been going through an awful depression. My doctor felt that the medication I was on was no longer working so he suggested a change. We changed about 6 weeks ago. At this point I’m not sure if the dose is wrong, the medication isn’t a good fit or the medication is making me worse. I have an appt at the end of this week with my doctor and also an appt to see my therapist in a few days (I’ve been going weekly for about the past 2 months. Also changed therapists because I don’t think the first was the best fit anymore for a multitude of reasons).

This is really the first time my partner of 3 yrs has seen me go through something like this. (He is 32, I’m 30, female). Honestly it’s been about 5 yrs since anything like this has happened. No real trigger. He’s been beyond lovely and supportive. Very patient and supportive, great communicator. As wonderful as he’s been, I am still really struggling with a lot of guilt for being so needy and emotional, really beating myself up and feeling irritable. 

About 2 weeks ago, his mom died unexpectedly. It’s been devastating to me to see him in pain and he is in deep, deep pain. He was super close with his mom. I am a natural fixer and so I jumped into action. He went home first (his family is about a 2hr plane ride away) and I came up 2 days later. When I was at home deep cleaned the house, set up all his favorite things, made a bunch of freezer meals etc because I wanted him to come back to a cozy comforting home. When I went up to see his family, the experience was very lovely. I felt like I was able to support his dad and sister and I feel like having things to do and people to take care of gave me a sense of purpose.

And now we are back home, and the depression is back and the grief is really settling in for my partner. I feel like there’s a lot I can do to support him still but I feel fragile. I can’t separate when he gets frustrated or irritable or takes something the wrong way from his grief and my depression. I keep having these waves of feeling like I’m doing everything wrong, I have no idea how to support him, and like I’m making things worse. I’ve been trying to compartmentalize my own depression and I think it’s made me colder and he is picking up on it. When I opened up about how I was feeling he was so sweet and comforting and that made me feel even worse because no one is supposed to be comforting someone else when they just lost a parent. 

I’m angry with myself I don’t know why I can’t get my shit together. I’m sad and embarrassed. The tiniest part wants to just leave so I don’t drag him down further. I won’t actually leave. He is the love of my life. We planned on getting engaged this year (I’m sure that’ll get pushed back that’s fine, not the point. Just a reference for how serious we are). But I need some advice on how the fuck to get through the next 4 days until I can see my therapist because I feel fucking horrible and useless and like he’d be better off without me.

title: slight vent i guess
text: i have been struggling with depression since elementary school i think, but last four years it has been worse. i was institutionalized with ocd during the initial covid outbreak, struggled there and got abused by the psychiatrists, afterwards i loosely managed to do schoolwork for two years while barely existing, like, i had fun and an ocassional chuckle here and there, but i wasn't really happy i think. afterwards last year i decided wrong on an extracurricular class selection and failed the grade because i couldnt handle it and a long-term paper and i was threatened i wouldn't be able to repeat the school year on my original school. my mom, who abused me but realized her faults and mistakes, managed to get me transferred to a different school, however since last september, i haven't been to school because i couldn't just bring myself to it, now my mother and i managed to get some sort of accomodation for me but it's still not enough and i just don't know how to make people leave me alone, i just don't see the point in school (education is great but just the mere concept of shuffling around and doing mandatory tasks instead of actually learning just makes me give up on it), i understand i should just "work it through" and get the graduation diploma but for what exactly? i'm unable to work and i just can't. my mom wants me to somehow pass the class but just thinking about studying and working makes me physically sad and dead inside.

title: Thinking of letting go...
text: Idk what else to do. I feel like just giving up nothing that i do seems to be good enough. I always get reminded of all my failures,mistakes and flaws. Feel like I'm just here without purpose, never had luck finding love and I'll probably end up dying alone. Feel like ending it will be easier no one cares. They say to talk to someone but i feel like i have no one that i can actually relied on. And i also don't wanna to be the dead brother or cousin. But letting go seems easy than to continue with this pain....

title: I feel like killing myself (17F)
text:
I’m too pussy to do it. But I fantasize about it. I already self harm as a way to cope, my dad took away my box cutter and all it did was make it harder to cope and it’s making me feel way more suicidal where as when I was still able to cut I’d just do it and it would help with the suicidal tendencies a lot. 

Killing myself would be an escape for me, my life has been hell for the past year or two. I’m 17F and I’ve been bullied at school by old friends, I’ve always had a hard time going to school because of my anxiety and lack of motivation to go. And I basically dropped out as of recently. I’m currently trying to get my GED but I still struggle with going. I haven’t gone for a month… I have a severe fear of abandonment and losing my friends was one of the most triggering things for me. Especially once they started harassing me at school the second we quit being mutuals. 

I’m not sure how to write everything this is going to be very messy I just want to rant about everything fucked in my life right now 

My mom died a few months ago. I tried waking her up to see her lifeless stiff, and cold body. I have vivid flashbacks of her body whenever I slightly get triggered into thinking anything related to parents or mothers. I loved my mom but I recently learned that I’ve been in denial my whole life, I never realized it but she was a druggie almost. She’d had a past with addictions, alcohol, drugs… and she had been prescribed pain meds and she had basically got hooked on them. When I was younger I noticed how she’d crush her meds up to cook them and inject them into herself for more effect. And she’d do this constantly. I never really noticed or admitted to myself what she was doing until after she was already dead. I was young and naive. I was blind. 

As of now I just procrastinate in fear every morning I wake up. Going to school is triggering and scary for me. Waking up to hear my dad ask if im going or  not. Just to hear his disappointed sigh. I’ve been a shut in on and off for the past 4 years. Ever since the harassment at school had basically started. I love my dad but he yells and makes me feel unsafe sometimes. And threatens to take away the things I love as punishment for something he doesn’t like.

I have a loving boyfriend. I’ve seen him a total of 3 times now, (we are long distance) I’m from Quebec and he is from Washington state. I love him so much he’s basically the only thing keeping me alive and only thing that’s kept me going this far. But it’s hard. Trying to imagine a future where we live together- especially with how I’m not going to school right now. And currently going through severe mental issues. My fear of abandonment really gets triggered when ever I’m without him. I have to know what he’s doing or where he is- I’m just a huge burden. I don’t know how he can love me.

Im not sure what else to explain this is my first time posting on Reddit. If anyone has questions I can reply.
